channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-alphabetize (0.0.20)
item.description: A Python style checker for alphabetizing import and __all__.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-stash (0.8)
item.description: A collection of flake8 checks.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-simplify (0.20)
item.description: flake8 plugin which checks for code that can be simplified
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-simplify (0.20)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-simplify
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-github-annotations (1)
item.description: A flake8 formatter that turns output into Github Annotations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: nitpick (0.33.1)
item.description: Enforce the same settings across multiple language-independent projects
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-nb (0.5.3)
item.description: Flake8 based checking for jupyter notebooks

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.3.23)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)
